body: You've spent your entire life thumbing your nose at the establishment and take pride in your run-ins with the law. Somehow, despite all your mischievous behavior, you've never been caught. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Escape Artist checks and a +1 trait bonus on initiative checks.
name: Rapscallion
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Race Traits/Gnome Race Traits/Rapscallion
